name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List
description: Project::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#etag
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: etag=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#etag=
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of projects.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new

projects = bigquery.projects
if projects.next?
  next_projects = projects.next
end

require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new

projects = bigquery.projects
if projects.next?
  next_projects = projects.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
Project
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves remaining results by repeatedly invoking #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each result, which is passed as the argument to the block.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method will make repeated API calls until all remaining results are retrieved. (Unlike #each, for example, which merely iterates over the results returned by a single API call.) Use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each result by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new

bigquery.projects.all do |project|
  puts project.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new

all_project_ids = bigquery.projects.all.map do |project|
  project.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new

bigquery.projects.all(request_limit: 10) do |project|
  puts project.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all projects. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each project.
